title: New Quinn Skin: Ameriquinn
body: Along the same lines as Uncle Ryze, I think Quinn should get pimped out in stars and stripes. Replace Valor with a Bald Eagle (and call him Freedom), give her a machinegun, make it all Murica-y. Let's face it, Quinn is quite and underplayed champ, at least in my elo, and I think she deserves a new skin. With it will come more attention, and the sheer badassery of self-righteous democracy. Riot please.
